title: Hawaii Rules of Evidence
context: Rule 101 Scope. These rules govern proceedings in the courts of the State of Hawaii, to the extent and with the exceptions stated in rule 1101. [L 1980, c 164, pt of ยง1] RULE 101 COMMENTARY This rule differs from Fed. R. Evid. 101 only in that &ldquo;courts of the State of Hawaii&rdquo; has been substituted for &ldquo;courts of the United States and before United States magistrates.&rdquo; Rule 1101 provides greater detail regarding the applicability of the rules in various courts and proceedings.
